name: Pyramid Rebellion
description:
The slaves of egypt have had enough! With the power of an ancient symbol they found while building the pyramid they will overthrow the tyrant pharao and destroy his precious pyramids!

This game was made for the JimJam #2

Game engine - Construct 3

Graphics tool - Pyxel Edit

SoundFX - BFXR

Plays like a classic breakout game where the paddle (slave carrying a plank) follows the mouse pointer horizontally. Click left mousebutton to spawn and launch the ball.
